:::: {.panel-tabset}
#### MBEPR – Very Short Stature for Age (*Muito Baixa Estatura Para a Idade*)

```{r}
mbepr_gam_1 <- mgcv::gam(
  mbepr ~ s(spei_12m) + s(gdp_per_capita) + s(year, bs = 're'),
  data = dplyr::mutate(data, year = as.integer(as.character(year))),
  family = mgcv::betar(link = "logit"),
  method = "REML"
)
```

```{r}
#| code-fold: false

mbepr_gam_1 |> summary()
```

::: {#tbl-mbepr-gam-1-r2}
```{r}
#| output: asis

mbepr_gam_1 |>
  summarise_r2(
    dplyr::mutate(data, year = as.integer(as.character(year))) |>
      nrow()
  ) |>
  md_named_tibble()
```

[Source: Created by the authors.]{.legend}

Confidence interval for the adjusted $\text{R}^{2}$ of the
`mbepr_gam_1` model.
:::

::: {#tbl-mbepr-gam-1-summary-stats}
```{r}
#| output: asis

mbepr_gam_1 |>
  broom::glance() |>
  tidyr::pivot_longer(dplyr::everything()) |>
  md_named_tibble()
```

[Source: Created by the authors.]{.legend}

Summary statistics of the `mbepr_gam_1` model.
:::

::: {#tbl-mbepr-gam-1-coef-stats}
```{r}
#| output: asis

mbepr_gam_1 |>
  summarise_coefs() |>
  md_named_tibble()
```

[Source: Created by the authors.]{.legend}

Value of the coefficients in the `mbepr_gam_1` model.
:::

::: {#fig-mbepr-gam-1-effects}
```{r}

for(i in plot$plots) print(i)
```

[Source: Created by the authors.]{.legend}

Effects of each term in the `mbepr_gam_1` model.
:::

::: {#fig-mbepr-gam-1-diagnostics}
```{r}
mbepr_gam_1 |> mgcViz::getViz() |> mgcViz::check.gamViz()
```

[Source: Created by the authors.]{.legend}

Diagnostics for the `mbepr_gam_1` model.
:::

::: {#fig-mbepr-gam-1-prediction-versus-spei}
```{r}
dplyr::mutate(data, year = as.integer(as.character(year))) |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    dplyr::across(
      .cols = dplyr::matches("^year$"),
      .fns = ~ .x |> as.character() |> as.numeric()
    )
  ) |>
  plot_gam(
    model = mbepr_gam_1,
    type = 1,
    x_label = "Standardised Precipitation Evapotranspiration Index (12 months)",
    y_label = "Predicted probability of MBEPR"
  )
```

[Source: Created by the authors.]{.legend}

Predicted probability of MBEPR (Very Short Stature for Age (*Muito Baixa Estatura Para a Idade*)) as a function of the smoothed 12-month Standardized Precipitation Evapotranspiration Index (SPEI), based on the `mbepr_gam_1` model. All other variables are held constant at their mean values except SPEI. Shaded areas indicates the pointwise 95% prediction confidence interval, while the faded dots in the background represent the observed data.
:::
